entry.title: Diaz Drinks the Juice

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,789Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 150

Summary: â€œI'm not in love with you.â€ Thereâ€™s a jolt in Eddieâ€™s stomach at that admission. â€œIâ€™m not secretly pining for you, or anything like that. I donâ€™t even see you that way.â€ â€œOh,â€ Eddie says, then forces out a laugh he hopes sounds casual. Buckâ€™s eyes are wide, honest, like heâ€™s desperate for Eddie to be reassured by this admission, to believe him. And how much clearer could he be? Heâ€™s not in love with Eddie. Thatâ€™s fine. Eddie never expected him to be. His now empty beer bottle hits the counter too loudly, â€œNo, of course not.â€Or: Buck reassures Eddie that he's not in love with him. entry.title: Buck and L.A. Diazes
entry.summary:
Author: Angelsofhope

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,529Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Evan Buckley was learning that no matter how hard you try, you cannot force things. Still off work recovering, even though he's passed his rectification, he is at a loss about how to get back to work. entry.title: True Loves Kiss
entry.summary:
Author: BuddiefanRPNJ

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,856Chapters: 5/9Kudos: 73

Summary: Buck inadvertently triggers a curse when he breaks the arm of Billy Boil's skeleton. It starts with a dislocated shoulder and progresses into boils growing all over his face. Eddie tries to be the supportive best friend while pining and trying to put his life back together. Christopher finds out what happened, and while talking to his father, suggests that True Love's Kiss will be able to break the curse on Buck. Featuring a sassy teen who is done with his dad's dancing around each other, a Buck who just maybe isn't as oblivious as everyone thinks, and an Eddie who has almost fully accepted himself, but spirals a bit along the way.
